case_data.name: EEOC v. FLYNN CONSTRUCTION, INC.
case_data.plaintiff_description: Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, on behalf of one or more workers.
settlement_agreement: Court Approved Settlement or Consent Decree
case_data.summary: In March 2004, the Philadelphia (along with the Pittsburgh) office of the EEOC brought this suit against Flynn Construction, Inc. in the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Pennsylvania. After the court denied the defendant's motion to dismiss EEOC's claims of hostile work environment and race discrimination, the case settled by entry of a consent decree in August 2004. No information was made available pertaining to the nature of the suit or the consent decree.
